languages.text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the target increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} dealt to the target by +5. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Каждый удар, который цель получает в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, который она получает от всех {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционных атак{/g}, на 5. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Each successful melee attack against the target increases damage from all ranged attacks dealt to the target by +5. Stacks.

languages.text: 每当使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}成功命中目标时，该名目标承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}远程{/g}攻击{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高5点。此效果可叠加。

traits.locale_text: 每当使用{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}成功命中目标时，该名目标承受的所有{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击伤害都会提高5点。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}が成功するごとに、ターゲットに与える全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃による{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+5増える。この効果は累積する。
languages.original_text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the target increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks dealt to the target by +5. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}が成功するごとに、ターゲットに与える全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}攻撃によるダメージが+5増える。この効果は累積する。

languages.text: Cada {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} que impacte al objetivo aumenta el {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de todos los {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ataques a distancia{/g} que reciba el objetivo en +5. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Jeder erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen das Ziel erhöht den {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aller {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}, die dem Ziel zugefügt werden, um +5. Stapelbar.

traits.locale_text: Jeder erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen das Ziel erhöht den Schaden aller {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g}, die dem Ziel zugefügt werden, um +5. Wird aufaddiert.

languages.text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} touchant la cible augmente de +5 les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}attaques à distance{/g} qu'elle subit. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Each successful {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against the target increases {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged attacks{/g} dealt to the target by +5. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} réussie contre la cible augmente de +5 les points de dégâts de toutes les attaques à {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distance{/g} lancées contre celle-ci. Cumulable.
